decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Location Plan and drawings 01, 03 and 04

Condition : 3 - The air source heat pump hereby approved shall not be used until details including mitigation measures are submitted to and approved by the Local Authority confirming the noise levels, (expressed as the equivalent continuous sound level) LAeq (15 minutes), from the air source heat pump do not exceed LA90-5dB at 1m from any habitable window with any residential property not associated with the development. The approved details shall be implemented prior to use and maintained thereafter. 

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining properties and to comply with the following Development Plan policies for Merton: policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan 2021, policy CS14 of Merton's Core Planning Strategy 2011 and policies DM D2 and D3 of Merton's Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant -Approved Schemes
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework, London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to the delivery of sustainable development, by:
1. Providing a formal pre-application advice service, details to be found on Planning pre-application advice service on LBM's website
2. Providing written policies and guidance, which is available to view on LBM's website.
3. Where appropriate, negotiating amendments to secure a positive decision.
4. Determining applications in a timely manner including providing a fast track service, details to be found on Get a quicker planning decision on LBM's website.

In this instance:
i) The application was acceptable as submitted, and approved without delay.
description: APPLICATION FOR THE INSTALLATION OF AN AIR SOURCE HEAT PUMP.
